Name: Axe Specialization
Description: While using axes, gain +3  Weapon Damage.

Name: Berserker
Description: Gain 3% physical damage bonus for every 10% of your maximum health missing, up to a maximum of 30% physical damage bonus

Name: Carnage
Description: When a target is killed, gain 75 Armor Rating for 15s.

Name: Executioner
Description: While using axes, gain 10% Physical Headshot power.

Name: Iron Will
Description: Gain 75 Magical Resistance and ignore knockback effects. The maximum Magical Damage Reduction limit is increased to 75%.

Name: Morale Boost
Description: Recover 33% maximum health after killing a player.

Name: Potion Chugger
Description: Gain 20% potency towards all drinks, while reducing the duration by 50%.

Name: Savage
Description: While not wearing any chest armor, gain 10% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Crush
Description: Gain the ability to destroy unreinforced doors and containers. Also gain 1 Impact Power on your attacks with two-handed weapons to defeat blocks and parries better.

Name: Robust
Description: Gain 10% Max Health Bonus.

Name: Treacherous Lungs
Description: Increases the duration of all shouting abilities 30%.

Name: Two-Hander
Description: When attacking with a two-handed weapon, gain 5% Physical Damage Bonus and 5% Armor Penetration.

Name: Achilles Strike
Description: Strike a target, reducing their move speed bonus by 30% for 2.5 seconds. While the buffed, each time the target moves they receive physical damage.

Name: Blood Exchange
Description: While active, each successful hit recovers health at a rate of 10% of damage dealt. In exchange, lose 10% max health bonus for 12 seconds.

Name: Rage
Description: Gain 15 Strength, 15 Vigor, and 12% Move Speed Bonus.While active, lose 15% Physical Damage Reduction for 6s.

Name: Reckless Attack
Description: Gain 85% Armor Penetration on your next melee attack. While active, lose 85 Armor Rating.

Name: Savage Roar
Description: Frightens all enemies within a 7.5m range radius for six seconds reducing their physical damage bonus by 30%.

Name: War Cry
Description: Gain 25% max health bonus for seven seconds. This effect applies to yourself and allies within a 7.5m radius.

Name: War Sacrifice
Description: While active, gained +5 all attributes. In exchange lose 10% of your maximum health over 12 seconds

Name: Adrenaline Spike
Description: When your health goes below 40%, gain 15% Action Speed for 12s.

Name: Barricade
Description: While in defensive stance, gain 50 Armor Rating and 50 Magical Resistance.

Name: Combo Attack
Description: When you successfully melee attack consecutively within 2s, gain 10% Physical Damage Bonus temporarily

Name: Counterattack
Description: When you successfully block an attack, gain 10% Move Speed Bonus and 10% Action Speed for 3s.

Name: Defense Mastery
Description: Gain an additional 10% Armor Rating Bonus from equipped armor. The maximum physical reduction limit is increased to 75%.

Name: Dual Wield
Description: While you have weapons equipped in both hands, gain 10% Action Speed.

Name: Projectile Resistance
Description: Gain 10% Projectile Damage Reduction.

Name: Shield Mastery
Description: While in defensive stance, gain 10% Move Speed Bonus. When you successfully block an attack, gain 50% Action Speed towards your next block or attack.

Name: Slayer
Description: While holding a weapon in each hand, gain 5 Weapon Damage and lose the ability to equip plate armor.

Name: Swift
Description: Reduces the armour move speed penalty by 30%. Not applicable to additional modifiers.

Name: Sword Mastery
Description: When using a Sword-type weapon, gain 2 Weapon Damage and 5% Action Speed. Also gain 10 additional Move Speed when taking a defensive stance with your sword.

Name: Weapon Mastery
Description: Gain the ablity to use any weapon. While using non-native weapon to your Class Requirements, lose 5% Physical Damage Bonus and 5% Magical damage Bonus on the weapon.

Name: Adrenaline Rush
Description: Gain 15% Action Speed and 5% Move Speed Bonus for 8s. After the duration ends, lose 8% Action Speed and 4% Move Speed Bonus for 2s.

Name: Breakthrough
Description: Remove the buffs that slow move speed, grants a 7 additional move speed, and ignores all move speed the buff effects for 12 seconds

Name: Perfect Block
Description: Gain 5 Impact Resistance for 6s.

Name: Second Wind
Description: Recover 40% Percent Maximum Health over 12s. Additionally, Second Wind removes the negative effects of the Adrenaline Rush.

Name: Shield Slam
Description: Inflicts 45 physical damage on the target, and reduces the target move speed bonus by 20% for 3 seconds.

Name: Spell Reflection
Description: While blocking, gain the ability to reflect spells. This buff persists until triggered, lasting 5 seconds. While active, also gain 5% magical damage reduction.

Name: Sprint
Description: Gain 3 stacks of Momentum, granting 15 additional Move Speed per stack. Lose 1 stack every 2s.

Name: Taunt
Description: Increases the aggro value to all monsters within a 7.5m area by 50%. Gain 12% Physical Damage Reduction and 12% Magical Damage Reduction for 10s.

Name: Victory Strike
Description: Your next attack deals additional 20% physical damage bonus. If the target dies from the attack, heal for 15% of your maximum health.

Name: Ambush
Description: When coming out of hide, you gain 10% Move Speed Bonus and 25% Physical Damage Bonus for 3s. If the melee attack is successful, the effect disappears.

Name: Back Attack
Description: When attacking a target from behind, gain 30% backstab power.

Name: Creep
Description: While crouch walking, reduce the volume of footsteps significantly.

Name: Dagger Mastery
Description: When using a dagger, gain 15% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Double Jump
Description: You gain the ability to jump an additional time in the air, but lose 10 additional move speed.

Name: Hide Mastery
Description: Increases the duration of the hide skill by 1.5 times and reduce its cooldown time by 30%.

Name: Jokester
Description: Give all party members +2 all attributes.

Name: Pickpocket
Description: Steal items from nearby enemies. Additionally, your hide will not be revealed when you are bumped into. Items worn in utility slots do not appear on the waist.

Name: Poisoned Weapon
Description: a successful attack applies poison that deals 4 magical damage and reduces their incoming physical healing by 10% and incoming magical healing by 10% over 4 seconds. The poison can stack up to 5 times.

Name: Stealth
Description: While hiding, gain the ability to move 10 steps while crouching or slow walking. Also gain 3 additional move speed  per remaining step.

Name: Thrust
Description: When using a dagger, gain an additional 20% Armor Penetration.

Name: Traps and Locks
Description: You can unlock locked locks without a lockpick and detect traps within a certain range to disarm them.

Name: Caltrops
Description: Drops Caltrops at your feet that deal 10 physical damage and slows the move speed bonus by 50% of anything that steps on them for three seconds.

Name: Cut Throat
Description: When you successfully hit a target, silence them for 2s, disabling the target's skills/spells/performance abilities.

Name: Hide
Description: Become invisible for 8s. It is possible to change your equipment in this state. You are revealed when you attempt an action, such as moving, attacking, using a skill.

Name: Rupture
Description: The next successful attack causes the target to bleed for 20 Physical damage over 5 seconds. The Buff is consumed when an attack hits an object or target.

Name: Smoke Pot
Description: A smoke pot is deployed creating a smoke screen. The smoke screen lasts 12s and covers a 6m area. When an enemy target enters the smoke screen, reduces their move speed bonus by 10%.

Name: Tumbling
Description: When used, backtumbles in the opposite direction the player is facing.

Name: Weakpoint Attack
Description: When you successfully hit a target, reduce their armour rating bonus by 40% for 3 seconds. Only when melee attacking.

Name: Camping Mastery
Description: Reduces campfire set up time by 50% and increases duration by 30%.

Name: Chase
Description: Detect recent enemy footsteps and can hear enemy footstep sounds from farther away.

Name: Crippling Shot
Description: Hitting the targets leg reduces their move speed bones by 40% for 1 second.

Name: Crossbow Mastery
Description: While using a crossbow, gain 5% Physical Damage Bonus and an additional 50% Action Speed while reloading.

Name: Kinesthesia
Description: When moving with the bowstring drawn move speed bonus increases by 15%.

Name: Nimble Hands
Description: When using a bow, increases your draw speed by 15%.

Name: Quick Reload
Description: When reloading a bow-type weapon, gain 50% Action Speed.

Name: Ranged Weapons Mastery
Description: When attacking with a ranged weapon, gain 5% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Sharpshooter
Description: When attacking with a ranged weapon, gain 15% headshot power.

Name: Spear Proficiency
Description: Gain the ability to equip spears. While using a spear, gain 5 Physical Power.

Name: Trap Mastery
Description: Dramatically decreases installation time for traps.

Name: Back Step
Description: Quickly retreat a short distance. It can be used in the air.

Name: Field Ration
Description: Forage food and recover 25 health.

Name: Forceful Shot
Description: When using a bow type weapon, gain the ability to knock targets back for 8 seconds.

Name: Multishot
Description: Fire 5 arrows at once in cone shaped dispersion.

Name: Penetrating Shot
Description: Gain 50% Headshot Penetration and 25% Armor Penetration for 8 seconds.

Name: Quick Fire
Description: Gain an additional 50% Action Speed for 8 seconds while using bow-type weapons.

Name: Quickshot
Description: Fire arrows in a quick succession. Each bow-type will fire a different amount of arrows.

Name: True Shot
Description: Projectile flight speed is greatly increased, also increasing physical damage bonus by 8% .

Name: Purge Shot
Description: removes all magical buffs from a target on each successful hit with a ranged weapon within 8 seconds. Deals 15 true physical damage on removing buffs.

Name: Arcane Feedback
Description: When you deal damage with an arcane spell, gain a stacking bonus granting 3% spellcasting speed and 3% arcane magical damage bonus per stack for seven seconds. This skill can stack up to 5 times and the duration resets with each successful stack.

Name: Arcane Mastery
Description: Gain 5% arcane magical damage bonus and reduce the cast time of arcane spells by 0.5 seconds.

Name: Fire Mastery
Description: Gain 5% fire magical damage bonus. The duration of applied burns are increased by two seconds, and a burned target reduces incoming physical healing by 50% and incoming magical healing by 50% for five seconds.

Name: Ice Mastery
Description: Dealing damage with Ice magic freezes the target's feet and prevents them from moving for 0.5 seconds.

Name: Ice Shield
Description: Gain 20 armour rating. Inflict frostbite for 0.5 seconds on melee attacker. Does not inflict while on cool down.

Name: Mana Surge
Description: Gain 10% Magical damage Bonus.

Name: Melt
Description: When you deal magical fire damage to a target, the target loses 20% physical damage reduction for five seconds.

Name: Quick Chant
Description: Gain 15% Spell Casting Speed.

Name: Reactive Shield
Description: When you take damage, gain an arcane shield that lasts for three seconds. The shield can absorb 15 total damage and will only reactivate after a cool down period.

Name: Sage
Description: Gain 10% Knowledge Bonus.

Name: Spell Overload
Description: Reduces knowledge bonus by 20% and increases all spells counts by 60%.

Name: Staff Mastery
Description: When using a staff-type weapon, you gain 2 magic weapon damage.

Name: Arcane Shield
Description: Gain a shield around you that absorbs 15 damage from all damage sources for 12 seconds. When the maximum amount of absorb has been reached, the shield  unleashes an arcane explosion, dealing five magical damage to enemy targets in a two meter radius around you.

Name: Intense Focus
Description: Reduce the cast time of your next spell to 0.1 seconds.

Name: Meditation
Description: Enter a meditative state and recover spells at a rate of 34 spells cost over 24 seconds.

Name: Spell Memory
Description: Gain the ability to memorize spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Spell Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to memorize additional spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Advanced Healer
Description: Gain 5 Magical Healing.

Name: Blunt Weapon Mastery
Description: While using a blunt weapon, gain 10% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Brewmaster
Description: When you drink alcohol, you no longer exhibit the detrimental drunk effects and gain 10 Strength.

Name: Faithfulness
Description: Gain 15% divine magical damage bonus. When a divine attack is successful, reduce their move speed bonus by 15% for 1.5 seconds. Does not inflict while on cooldown.

Name: Holy Aura
Description: Gain 15 Armor Rating and 15 Magic Resistance. This affects both yourself and allies within 6m.

Name: Holy Water
Description: Drinking drink eliminates all removable curse effects.

Name: Kindness
Description: Heal yourself for 15% of the spell's total heal amount when healing another target.

Name: Over Healing
Description: Even if the targets health is at full health, additional healing can be done by 20% of the targets maximum health. Bonus health degenerates at 2% per second.

Name: Perseverance
Description: Reduces all types of incoming damage by 2.

Name: Protection from Evil
Description: Reduce the duration of all harmful effects by 30%.

Name: Requiem
Description: Resurrecting an ally revives them with 50% HP instead of a sliver of life. When reviving an ally at the altar of sacrifice, you do not need to sacrifice any of your own health.

Name: Undead Slaying
Description: Gain 20% undead damage bonus against undead monsters.

Name: Divine Protection
Description: Gain 30% physical damage reduction for four seconds.

Name: Holy Purification
Description: After channelling for 1.5 seconds, deal 100 divine magical damage to all undead monsters within a 7.5 meter radius around you.

Name: Judgement
Description: After channelling for one second, deal 25 divine magical damage to a target and reduce their move speed bonus by 30% for two seconds. Once the channel begins on a target, crosshair targeting is no longer required this spell has a 5 m range and will fail if the target goes out of range.

Name: Smite
Description: Deal an additional 10 magical damage to all enemies you hit within seven seconds. Only when Melee attacking.

Name: Spell Memory
Description: Gain the ability to memorise spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Spell Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to memorise additional spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Charismatic Performance
Description: Upgrades a good performance into a perfect performance.

Name: Dancing Feet
Description: While holding an instrument, gain 10 additional move speed.

Name: Fermata
Description: Gain 5 Resourcefulness

Name: Jolly Time
Description: Drinking Ale recovers 5 health, and grants 10 additional move speed  while drunk.

Name: Lore Mastery
Description: Grants 25% regular interaction speed .

Name: Melodic Protection
Description: While playing music, gain 30% physical damage reduction.

Name: Rapier Mastery
Description: While using rapier, gain two weapon damage and 5% action speed.

Name: Reinforced Instruments
Description: When attacking with an instrument, gain 50% physical damage bonus.

Name: Story Teller
Description: Give all nearby party members around a +3 will and +3 knowledge buff.

Name: Superior Dexterity
Description: 50% faster switching time when switching between weapons/utility items.

Name: Wanderer's Luck
Description: Increases the chance of finding high-quality items when opening treasure chests.

Name: War Song
Description: Successful performance increases nearby allies weapon damage by three for six seconds

Name: Dissonance
Description: Plays an instrument to make an unpleasant noise that silence all enemy targets for three seconds.

Name: Encore
Description: The next song will automatically play at maximum speed and will be played perfectly.

Name: Party Maker
Description: Play an instrument to remove the drinking effect from all nearby allies.

Name: Music Memory
Description: Gain the ability to store up to 5 sheets of music.

Name: Music Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to store up to 5 sheets of music.

Name: Dreamwalk
Description: When you take damage, your magical power increases by five for three seconds and you become spiritual. The player does not collide with other targets and cannot attack or use skills but can cast spells this ability triggers once every 18 seconds.

Name: Enhanced Wildness
Description: While you are in animal form, you gain five additional move speed and 10 armor rating

Name: Force of Nature
Description: When you heal a target, the target gains three physical power for three seconds.

Name: Herbal Sensing
Description: Detects nearby herbs.

Name: Natural Healing
Description: Recovering yourself and nearby allies one health every three seconds.

Name: Shapeshift Mastery
Description: Changes form instantly without casting time.

Name: Spirit Bond
Description: Once every 1 second, you will receive 15% of damage received by party members instead, can receive damage up to 20.

Name: Spirit Magic Mastery
Description: When you cast  Spirit magic, you gain 10 Magical Power.

Name: Sun and Moon
Description: Nearby allies gain 3 Vigor and 5 Magical Power.

Name: Thorn Coat
Description: When melee attacked, return 5 True Physical Damage to the attacker.

Name: Lifebloom Aura
Description: Restores an additional two health to target when Caster Heals self or allies within aura range. Disable Shapeshift.

Name: Shapeshift Memory
Description: Transforms into the selected creature. Tools cannot be used in a nonhuman state.

Name: Spell Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to memorise additional spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Spell Memory
Description: Gain the ability to memorise spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Apex of Sorcery
Description: While casting spells, reduce movement speed by 99%, but gain 50% magical damage bonus and 50% spellcasting speed.

Name: Mana Fold
Description: Reduce cooldowns of all spells by 25%, but reduce spellcasting speed by 15%.

Name: Spell Merge
Description: While using bare hands, casting two combinable spells simultaneously allows you to use a new spell.

Name: Spell Sculpting
Description: Increases the range of all spells by 25% and the area of effect by 25%, but increases the cool downtime by 25%.

Name: Spell Stride
Description: Gain 5% moves been bonus while casting spells

Name: Time Distortion
Description: All spellcasting times are reduced to 0, but cooldown times are increased by four times

Name: Sorcery Memory
Description: Gain the ability to use sorcery in the dungeon

Name: Sorcery Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to use sorcery in the dungeon.

Name: Antimagic
Description: Gain 25% magical damage reduction except against divine magic.

Name: Curse Mastery
Description: Gain 30% duration towards all curses cast.

Name: Dark Enhancement
Description: Gain 10% dark magical damage bonus towards dark magic spells.

Name: Dark Reflection
Description: While active, reflect 10 magical damage to the Melee. Does not reflect while on cool down.

Name: Demon Armor
Description: Gain the ability to equip plate armour. Lose spellcasting speed by 10%.

Name: Immortal Lament
Description: Casting spells will no longer take you below 1 health.

Name: Infernal Pledge
Description: Reduces damage taken from undead and demons by 25%.

Name: Malice
Description: Gain 10% Will Bonus.

Name: Shadow Touch
Description: Dealing physical damage to an enemy with a Melee weapon deals 2 true magical damage and heals you for two health

Name: Soul Collector
Description: When you deal the final blow to an enemy, one darkness shard is collected. Gain one all attributes, 20% dark magical damage bonus for each shard collected, up to a maximum of five shards. When a dark magic spell is cast, consume all collected shards.

Name: Torture Mastery
Description: All curses inflicted upon enemies restore two health to the caster with each instance of damage dealt. All warlock spells costs are doubled when this perk is equipped.

Name: Vampirism
Description: Gain 20% magical healing bonus.

Name: Blood Pact
Description: Take the form of your contracted Demon, gaining an additional 50 max health, 30 armour rating, and 30 magic resistance. Your entire body is covered in abyssal flame, taking 2% damage per second and dealing 2 magical damage per second to nearby characters. once activated, the effect cannot be stopped until the contract is complete, additionally by consuming darkness shards you gain one all attributes, 10% dark magical damage bonus for each darkness shard consumed when you become demon your skills change to Demon only skills.

Name: Blow of Corruption
Description: Your next physical attack deals 12 magical damage to the target and reduces their incoming physical healing by 80% and incoming magical healing by 80% for 12 seconds.

Name: Dark Offering
Description: Channel your mind, sacrificing 10% of your max health per second to gain 5% magical damage bonus and 5% physical damage bonus. This bonus last for 15 seconds.

Name: Phantomize
Description: phase through Melee attacks and projectiles for six seconds. While active, gain 5% move speed bonus and lose 50% magical damage reduction. During this period you can only move and do not collide with other players or monsters.

Name: Spell Memory
Description: Gain the ability to memorize spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Spell Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to memorize additional spells to use in the dungeon.
